name: part_007
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】「輪廻転生」⧸ Amane Kanata 3DLIVE ＂Reincarnation＂【#天音かなた4周年LIVE ⧸ ホロライブ】 [APoXxcv37GU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'Wanderlust' by Amane Kanata in an industrial ruins setting.
Performance of 'Idol' by Amane Kanata on a futuristic neon stage.

subtitles.original:
ワンダーラスト
作詞・作曲：sasakure.UK
subtitles.english:
Wanderlust
Lyrics & Composition: sasakure.UK

subtitles.original: ふと 旅に出たくなるように
subtitles.english: Just as one might suddenly feel like going on a journey,

subtitles.original: 人は皆
subtitles.english: Everyone

subtitles.original: 眠る場所を求めるものだと
subtitles.english: seeks a place to sleep.

subtitles.original: 君は言うけど
subtitles.english: Or so you say.

subtitles.original: あの日 終末を知ったときには
subtitles.english: But back when I learned of the end,

subtitles.original: ここも
subtitles.english: This place, too...

subtitles.original: あたたかくも 寒くもない速度で
subtitles.english: was falling at a speed that was neither warm nor cold.

subtitles.original: 落ちていた
subtitles.english: It was falling.

subtitles.original: 神様が もしもいたとしても
subtitles.english: Even if there were a God,

subtitles.original: 大きな空 溢れるほどの虹 かけてくれなくていい
subtitles.english: You don't have to cast a rainbow across the vast sky.

subtitles.original: ただひとつ 願いをかけるとしたら
subtitles.english: If I were to make just one wish,

subtitles.original: 君の元へ 歌を届けたい
subtitles.english: I'd want to deliver a song to you.

subtitles.original: 巡る 巡る 最後のメロディ
subtitles.english: Round and round goes the final melody.

subtitles.original: 君が 笑ってくれるのならば 僕は
subtitles.english: If it would make you smile, I...

subtitles.original: 消えてしまっても かまわないから
subtitles.english: ...wouldn't mind even if I disappeared.

subtitles.original: 君が 涙の海に身を投げても
subtitles.english: Even if you threw yourself into a sea of tears,

subtitles.original: 握り締めた手 離さないから
subtitles.english: I wouldn't let go of your hand.

subtitles.original: 白い 嘘だらけの世界だとしても
subtitles.english: Even if this is a world full of white lies,

subtitles.original: 消えてしまっても かまわないから
subtitles.english: I wouldn't mind even if I disappeared.

subtitles.original: 旅の終わりの 夢に見たように
subtitles.english: Just as I saw in my dream at the end of the journey,

subtitles.original: なるようになれ なるようになれ
subtitles.english: Let it be, let it be.

subtitles.original: 終わらない歌を歌おう 僕が
subtitles.english: Let's sing a song that never ends,

subtitles.original: 終わってしまう前に
subtitles.english: Before I come to an end.

subtitles.original: 終わらない歌を歌おう 僕が
subtitles.english: Let's sing a song that never ends,

subtitles.original: 終わってしまう前に
subtitles.english: Before I come to an end.

subtitles.original: 終わらない歌を歌おう 僕が
subtitles.english: Let's sing a song that never ends,

subtitles.original: 終わってしまう前に
subtitles.english: Before I come to an end.

subtitles.original: 終わらない歌を歌おう 僕が
subtitles.english: Let's sing a song that never ends,

subtitles.original: 終わってしまう前に
subtitles.english: Before I come to an end.

subtitles.original: 終わらない歌を歌おう 僕が
subtitles.english: Let's sing a song that never ends.

subtitles.original: 無敵の笑顔で荒らすメディア
subtitles.english: Taking the media by storm with an invincible smile,

subtitles.original: 知りたいその秘密ミステリアス
subtitles.english: Everyone wants to know her mysterious secret.

subtitles.original: 抜けてるところさえ彼女のエリア
subtitles.english: Even her flaws are part of her charm.

subtitles.original: 完璧で嘘つきな君は
subtitles.english: You are a perfect liar,

subtitles.original: 天才的なアイドル様
subtitles.english: A genius idol.

subtitles.original:
アイドル
作詞・作曲：Ayase
subtitles.english:
Idol
Lyrics & Composition: Ayase

subtitles.original: 今日何食べた？ 好きな本は？
subtitles.english: "What did you eat today?" "What's your favorite book?"

subtitles.original: 遊びに行くならどこに行くの？
subtitles.english: "Where do you go when you go out for fun?"

subtitles.original: 何も食べてない それは内緒
subtitles.english: "I haven't eaten anything." That's a secret.

subtitles.original: 何を聞かれてものらりくらり
subtitles.english: No matter what she's asked, she dodges the questions.

subtitles.original: そう淡々と だけど燦々と
subtitles.english: So aloof, yet so brilliant.

subtitles.original: 見えそうで見えない秘密は蜜の味
subtitles.english: Her secret, seemingly within reach yet unreachable, tastes like honey.

subtitles.original: あれもないないない
subtitles.english: Not that, no, no, no.

subtitles.original: これもないないない
subtitles.english: Not this, no, no, no.

subtitles.original: 好きなタイプは？ 相手は？ さあ答えて
subtitles.english: "What's your type?" "Who's your partner?" Come on, tell us!

subtitles.original: 「誰かを好きになることなんて私分からなくてさ」
subtitles.english: "Falling in love with someone... I just don't really get it."

subtitles.original: 嘘か本当か知り得ない
subtitles.english: Whether it's a lie or the truth, there's no way to know.

subtitles.original: そんな言葉にまた一人堕ちる
subtitles.english: Yet another person falls for those words.

subtitles.original: また好きにさせる
subtitles.english: Making them fall in love again.

subtitles.original: 誰もが目を奪われていく
subtitles.english: Everyone's eyes are drawn to you.

subtitles.original: 君は完璧で究極のアイドル
subtitles.english: You are the perfect and ultimate idol.

subtitles.original: 金剛石（こんごうせき）現れない 一番星の生まれ変わり
subtitles.english: A diamond that will never appear again, the reincarnation of the first star.

subtitles.original: その笑顔で 愛してるで
subtitles.english: With that smile and that "I love you,"

subtitles.original: 誰も彼も虜にしていく
subtitles.english: You captivate one and all.

subtitles.original: その瞳が その言葉が
subtitles.english: Even if those eyes and those words

subtitles.original: 嘘でもそれは完全な愛
subtitles.english: are lies, it is perfect love.

subtitles.original: はいはい あの子は特別です
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, that girl is special.

subtitles.original: 我々は端からおまけです
subtitles.english: We are just extras from the start.

subtitles.original: お星様の引き立て役Bです
subtitles.english: Supporting Actor B for the star.

subtitles.original: 全てがあの子のおかげなわけない
subtitles.english: There's no way it's all thanks to her.

subtitles.original: 洒落臭い 妬み嫉みなんてない
subtitles.english: How annoying. No, I'm not jealous or envious.

subtitles.original: わけがない これはネタじゃない
subtitles.english: There's no way. This isn't a joke.

subtitles.original: からこそ許せない
subtitles.english: That's why I can't forgive it.
